description.Description: the description of the health alert that will be included in the alert email.

enabled.Description: the flag that indicates whether the health alert is enabled.

scopes.Description: the list of resource id's that this health alert is scoped to.

criteria.Description: Specifies the resource health alert criteria for a single resource that has multiple metric criteria.

actions.Description: the array of actions that are performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.

lastUpdatedTime.Description: Last time the rule was updated in ISO8601 format.

allOf.Description: The list of metric criteria for this 'all of' operation.

monitorNames.Description: Names of health monitor on which to define alert

monitorTypes.Description: Names of health monitor type on which to define alert

namespace.Description: Specifies the health alert criteria to alert on.

actionGroupId.Description: the id of the action group to use.

webHookProperties.Description: The properties of a webhook object.
